sourcesContent:
import Card from "react-bootstrap"
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button';
import carImage from '../img/toyota_aygoxxlimitedsu1b_angularfront.jpg';


export default function VehicleCard({carImage}) {
  return (<Card style={{ width: '18rem' }}>
                <Card.Img className="mt-5" variant="top" src={carImage} />
                <Card.Body>
                    <Card.Title className='text-primary vehicle-card-title'>Toyota - Aygox</Card.Title>
                    <Card.Text className='text-dark mb-0'>
                        2007 - 100 000 km 
                    </Card.Text> 
                    <Card.Text className='text-dark'>
                        Diesel - Manuelle 6
                    </Card.Text> 
                    <Container className= 'text-center'>
                        28000â‚¬
                    </Container>
                    <Button variant="primary">Go somewhere</Button>
                </Card.Body>
            </Card>)}
